Fales Library and Special Collections
Fisher and Levy Archives
Fisher & Levy
Fisher, Chip (Charles)
MSS 372
0.25 Linear Feet in 1 half manuscript box.
1978-2006 Fisher & Levy was a New York City catering business established by Chip Fisher and Doug Levy in 1983. Fisher & Levy offered high-end, corporate catering services as well as individual takeout items. This collection contains materials created and collected by the Fisher & Levy catering company. Materials include press clippings, correspondence from customers, certificates, and menus. Materials date from 1978 to 2006. Materials are in English. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Chip Fisher, 2013. The accession number associated with this gift is 2013.372.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Historical Note
Fisher & Levy was a New York City catering business established by Chip Fisher and Doug Levy in 1983. Fisher & Levy offered daily corporate catering services as well as individual takeout items from their storefront location in Sutton Place. The catering company focused on providing high-end meals and food items tailored to appeal to a sophisticated, corporate clientele. Chip Fisher, a former IBM salesperson, handled the overall business, while Doug Levy, chef, was in charge of the cooking.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Fisher and Levy Archives; MSS 372; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
Processing Information
Materials placed in archival folders and boxes.
Scope and Contents
This collection contains materials created and collected by the Fisher & Levy catering company. A majority of the collection contains press clippings regarding the company, and the owners Chip Fisher and Doug Levy. A smaller portion of the collection contains correspondence from customers, certificates, and menus. Materials date from 1978 to 2006.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Fisher & Levy was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
